    • Uses of PixelSelect in tech.lity.rea.skatolo

      Methods in tech.lity.rea.skatolo that return PixelSelect 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PixelSelect SkatoloBase.addPixelSelect(Object theObject, String theIndex, String theName) 
      PixelSelect SkatoloBase.addPixelSelect(Object theObject, String theIndex, String theName, int theX, int theY, int theW, int theH) 
      PixelSelect SkatoloBase.addPixelSelect(String theName)
      Adds a default PixelSelect, the default value is 1, width and height are set to the default values of PixelSelect.autoWidth and PixelSelect.autoHeight

    • Uses of PixelSelect in tech.lity.rea.skatolo.gui.widgets

      Methods in tech.lity.rea.skatolo.gui.widgets that return PixelSelect 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PixelSelect PixelSelect.setArrayValue(float[] theValue)
      Sets the value of the controller.
      PixelSelect PixelSelect.setTriggerEvent(int theEventID)
      By default a bang is triggered when the mouse is pressed. use setTriggerEvent(PixelSelect.PRESSED) or setTriggerEvent(PixelSelect.RELEASE) to define the action for triggering a bang. currently only PixelSelect.PRESSED and PixelSelect.RELEASE are supported.
      PixelSelect PixelSelect.update() 
      PixelSelect PixelSelect.updateDisplayMode(int theMode) 
      PixelSelect PixelSelect.updateViewMode(int theMode)
